com.igormaznitsa.prol.parser
Class ProlTreeBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.igormaznitsa.prol.parser.ProlTreeBuilder

public final class ProlTreeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

The class implements the prol tree builder. It's very important class because it allows to make term tree from read terms.

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)
See Also:
ProlTokenizer

Method Detail

readPhraseAndMakeTree

public final Term readPhraseAndMakeTree(java.lang.String str)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
Parse a string and make a term tree from it.

Parameters:
str - the string to be parsed, must not be null
Returns:
the term tree
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown it there will be any transport error
java.lang.InterruptedException - it will be thrown if the thread has been interrupted

readPhraseAndMakeTree

public final Term readPhraseAndMakeTree(ProlTokenizer tokenizer,
                                        ProlReader reader)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Read and make tree with predefined both a prol reader and a prol tokenizer

Parameters:
tokenizer - the tokenizer to be used for parsing, must not be null
reader - the reader to be used for reading, must not be null
Returns:
the term tree or null if the stream end has been reached
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown it there will be any transport error

readPhraseAndMakeTree

public final Term readPhraseAndMakeTree(ProlReader reader)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
Read and make tree with a predefined prol reader

Parameters:
reader - the prol reader which will be used to read next token, must not be null
Returns:
the term tree
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown it there will be any transport error
java.lang.InterruptedException - it will be thrown if the thread has been interrupted
